Package csheets.ext.style.ui

Provides UI components for setting cell style.

Class Summary
AlignBottomAction A bottom-alignment operation.

AlignTopAction A top-alignment operation.

BoldAction A font weight changing operation.
BorderAction A border changing operation.

StyleAction A style operation.
StyleMenu A menu that displays style-related actions.
StyleToolBar A tool bar that displays style-related actions.
StyleUIExtension The user interface extension for style.
